title: Adobe Color
description: Tool for creating color palettes based on various combinations such as complementary, analogous, and monochromatic.

title: Coolors
description: Color palette generator that allows you to explore harmonious combinations and see palettes created by other users.

title: Color Hunt
description: Collection of free, high-quality color palettes curated by the community.

title: Material Palette
description: Color palette generator inspired by Google's Material Design guidelines.

title: Color Supply
description: Color palette generator offering harmonious combinations and allowing you to explore palettes created by other users.

title: ColorSpace
description: Color palette generator offering harmonious combinations and allowing you to explore palettes created by other users.

title: ColorZilla
description: Browser extension that allows you to get the color code of any element on a webpage.

title: Color Picker by Hex
description: Tool that allows you to select colors and get their codes in hexadecimal and RGB format.

title: Tintmint
description: Color palette generator with a simple and visual interface, allowing you to explore color combinations for design.

title: UI Colors
description: Color palette generator for user interface designers, with a simple interface to create and copy color combinations.

title: Palette Maker
description: App that allows you to create color palettes from images with customization options.

title: Color Beta
description: Online tool to explore color combinations easily with options to create custom palettes.

title: Happy Hues
description: Color palette generator with harmonious combinations and usage examples to facilitate color choices in web design.

title: Colormind
description: Color palette generator using artificial intelligence that allows you to create palettes based on images or predefined colors.

title: uigradients
description: Collection of gradients inspired by the colors used by Snapchat.

title: Eva Design Colors
description: Color palette generator with a wide variety of harmonious combinations for web design.

title: CopyPalette
description: Color palette generator that allows you to easily copy and paste color combinations.

title: Flat UI Colors
description: Collection of flat colors that makes it easier to create modern and minimalist palettes.
